traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drider has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Web Walker
entries: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The drider makes three attacks, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 2 (1d4 damage) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) poison damage.
